verses.name: Zechariah 11:7
verses.text: And I will feed the flock of slaughter, even you, O poor of the flock. And I took unto me two staves; the one I called Beauty, and the other I called Bands; and I fed the flock.

verses.name: Zechariah 11:8
verses.text: Three shepherds also I cut off in one month; and my soul lothed them, and their soul also abhorred me.

verses.name: Zechariah 11:9
verses.text: Then said I, I will not feed you: that that dieth, let it die; and that that is to be cut off, let it be cut off; and let the rest eat every one the flesh of another.
